title: Catherine Cesarsky - Wikipedia
snippet: Born in France, Catherine Cesarsky was largely raised in Argentina and she received a degree in physical sciences at the University of Buenos Aires. She graduated with a PhD in astronomy in 1971 from Harvard University (Cambridge, Mass., USA).

title: Dr. Catherine Cesarsky | ESO
snippet: Born in France, Catherine Cesarsky received a degree in Physical Sciences at the University of Buenos Aires and graduated with a PhD in Astronomy in 1971 from Harvard University (Cambridge, Mass., USA). snippet: Born in France and raised in Argentina, Catherine Cesarsky received a degree in Physical Sciences at the University of Buenos Aires.
